name: remember - relive
description:
You are dead... That's kind of a bummer. You weren't even a good person while you where alive... That's a bigger bummer. However, there's one nice bit; death has allowed you a chance to make up for all the bad things you did when you were alive. 

And so you set out on a short journey through all of your memories, changing a few of them as you go along. Will you get to the ending, change your life for the better, and ensure your death is without guilt or doubt? Or will you fall into a hole and die. Anything could happen!

Remember - Relive is a runner/platformer at the beginning, but as the game proceeds and you live through some of the memories from your elderly years, it takes a calmer and more puzzling turn. Throughout the first part of the game you make decisions that will affect what happens at the end of the game. There are five possible endings, and whether they are good or bad is up to you! You may have beaten the game, but if you've won or not is your choice alone.

Controls:

Space to jump, or use a double jump if you have any,

Tab to toggle between "O" blocks and "X" blocks whenever you are on top of either.

Download instructions:

Unzip the .zip file and open the .exe file.
